article_title: CMO Today: Snapchat Working With Nielsen to Up Its Measurement Game
article_text: SNAPSTAT: Snapchat often talks about having audiences that rival TV. And the red hot mobile app company likes to sell its ads like TV, touting big reach in short bursts of time. Snapchat even recently partnered with Viacom so the TV giant could help Snapchat sell ads to TV marketers. But those advertisers have been imploring Snapchat to provide some kind of third-party validation for its huge numbers. Now they are getting their wish, as Snapchat announced it’s working with Nielsen to track ad campaigns, reports CMO Today. If this data reveals what many people believe—that Snapchat ads reach a whole lot more young...

article_summary:
Now they are getting their wish, as Snapchat announced it’s working with Nielsen to track ad campaigns, reports CMO Today.
Snapchat even recently partnered with Viacom so the TV giant could help Snapchat sell ads to TV marketers.
If this data reveals what many people believe—that Snapchat ads reach a whole lot more young...
And the red hot mobile app company likes to sell its ads like TV, touting big reach in short bursts of time.
But those advertisers have been imploring Snapchat to provide some kind of third-party validation for its huge numbers.
